statements: SELECT * FROM renewable_energy_production;
SELECT production_id, timestamp, solar_energy FROM renewable_energy_production WHERE wind_energy > 100;
SELECT timestamp, wind_energy FROM renewable_energy_production ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT AVG(solar_energy) AS average_solar_energy FROM renewable_energy_production;
SELECT production_id, timestamp, hydro_energy FROM renewable_energy_production WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM renewable_energy_production;
SELECT production_id, timestamp, solar_energy FROM renewable_energy_production ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT AVG(solar_energy) AS avg_solar_energy, MAX(wind_energy) AS max_wind_energy FROM renewable_energy_production;
SELECT * FROM renewable_energy_production WHERE hydro_energy > 100 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM renewable_energy_production WHERE solar_energy > wind_energy OR hydro_energy > 50;
SELECT * FROM renewable_energy_production;
SELECT id, production_date, production_value FROM renewable_energy_production WHERE production_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT site_name, capacity FROM energy_production_sites ORDER BY site_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM renewable_energy_production WHERE production_value > 1000 ORDER BY production_date DESC;
SELECT site_id, site_location FROM energy_production_sites WHERE capacity >= 500 ORDER BY site_id ASC;
SELECT id, production_date, production_time, production_value FROM renewable_energy_production
SELECT * FROM renewable_energy_production ORDER BY production_date ASC, production_time DESC
SELECT site_name, site_location, capacity FROM energy_production_sites WHERE capacity > 100
SELECT * FROM renewable_energy_production WHERE production_value BETWEEN 1000 AND 2000
SELECT * FROM energy_production_sites ORDER BY site_location DESC
SELECT * FROM renewable_energy_production;
SELECT id, production_date, production_time, production_value FROM renewable_energy_production WHERE id = 1;
SELECT source_name, source_type FROM energy_sources ORDER BY source_name DESC;
SELECT consumer_name, consumption_value FROM energy_consumers WHERE consumption_value > 100 ORDER BY consumer_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM renewable_energy_production WHERE production_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM renewable_energy_production WHERE production_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT source_name, source_type FROM energy_sources ORDER BY source_name DESC;
SELECT consumer_name, consumption_date, consumption_value FROM energy_consumers WHERE consumption_date BETWEEN '2022-02-01' AND '2022-03-01' ORDER BY consumption_value DESC;
SELECT production_date, production_value FROM renewable_energy_production WHERE production_time >= '12:00:00' AND production_value > 100 ORDER BY production_value DESC;
SELECT source_name, source_type FROM energy_sources WHERE source_type = 'Solar Power' AND source_name LIKE 'Solar%' ORDER BY source_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM renewable_energy_production WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT id, date, energy_source, production_amount FROM renewable_energy_production WHERE location = 'California' ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM locations WHERE latitude > 40 ORDER BY location_name ASC;
SELECT source_name, source_type FROM energy_sources WHERE source_type = 'Solar' LIMIT 3;
SELECT data_id, production_id, source_id, location_id, analysis_date FROM analysis_data WHERE analysis_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY analysis_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM renewable_energy_production;
SELECT production_amount, energy_source, date FROM renewable_energy_production WHERE location='New York';
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM locations ORDER BY location_name DESC;
SELECT source_name, source_type FROM energy_sources WHERE source_type='Solar' OR source_type='Wind' ORDER BY source_name ASC;
SELECT production_amount, analysis_result FROM renewable_energy_production JOIN analysis_data ON renewable_energy_production.id = analysis_data.production_id WHERE DATE(analysis_date) = CURDATE();
SELECT * FROM energy_production_data;
SELECT date, production_value FROM energy_production_data ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT plant_name, location FROM power_plants WHERE capacity > 100;
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption WHERE date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT source_name, type, capacity FROM energy_sources ORDER BY capacity DESC;
SELECT * FROM energy_production_data ORDER BY date DESC, production_value ASC;
SELECT plant_name, location, capacity FROM power_plants WHERE capacity > 100 ORDER BY plant_name;
SELECT source_name, type, capacity FROM energy_sources WHERE type = 'Renewable' AND capacity >= 500 ORDER BY capacity DESC;
SELECT connection_name, grid_type, voltage FROM grid_connections WHERE voltage < 100 ORDER BY connection_name DESC;
SELECT date, time, consumption_value FROM energy_consumption WHERE date = '2022-09-15' ORDER BY time ASC;
